article.title: Lockheed to Provide Intelligence Training for INSCOM
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Services Incorporated, Gaithersburg, Maryland, was awarded an $89,450,229 contract. The award will provide for the intelligence training and readiness support services. The U.S. Army Intelligence and Security Command (INSCOM), Fort Belvoir, Virginia, is the contracting activity.
